prompt: <description>Part 1: Rectangular Prism Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. Begin by creating a new coordinate system for part 1. Set the Euler angles to [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and the translation vector to [0.0, 0.25, 0.0]. Next, draw the 2D sketch on face 1. The sketch consists of four lines: 1. line\\_1: Start point at [0.0, 0.0], end point at [0.75, 0.0]. 2. line\\_2: Start point at [0.75, 0.0], end point at [0.75, 0.25]. 3. line\\_3: Start point at [0.75, 0.25], end point at [0.0, 0.25]. 4. line\\_4: Start point at [0.0, 0.25], end point at [0.0, 0.0]. The sketch comprises a single face (face\\_1). Then, scale the 2D sketch using a scaling parameter of 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch, creating a 3D model with an extrusion depth towards the normal of 0.25 and an extrusion depth opposite the normal of 0.0. Utilize the same sketch scaling parameter as in the previous step. The final dimensions of part 1 are as follows: - Length: 0.75 - Width: 0.25 - Height: 0.75 Part 2: Curved Top Rectangular Prism Construct a three-dimensional, rectangular prism with a curved top and a flat bottom. Begin by creating a new coordinate system for part 2. Set the Euler angles to [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and the translation vector to [0.0388, 0.0, 0.25]. Next, draw the 2D sketch on face 1. The sketch consists of an arc and a line: 1. arc\\_1: Start point at [0.0, 0.0], mid point at [0.0679, 0.024], end point at [0.1357, 0.0]. 2. line\\_1: Start point at [0.1357, 0.0], end point at [0.0, 0.0]. The sketch comprises a single face (face\\_1) and a single loop (loop\\_1). Do not scale the 2D sketch. Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the euler angles and translation vector from the coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch, creating a 3D model with an extrusion depth towards the normal of 0.0, and an extrusion depth opposite the normal of 0.25. No scaling is required. The final dimensions of part 2 are as follows: - Length: 0.1357 - Width: 0.25 - Height: 0.1357</description>
completion:
<json>
{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.25,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.25]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.25],"End Point":[0.0,0.25]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.25],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.25,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}},"part_2":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0388,0.0,0.25]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"arc_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"Mid Point":[0.0679,0.024],"End Point":[0.1357,0.0]},"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.1357,0.0],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.0,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.25,"sketch_scale":0.1357,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
</json>
